page.title: 17BUISINESSES
page.content: As shown on previous pages there are considerable numbers of business activities in the village including 2 Caravan sites,a Riding Centre,a small woodyard and several B&B. Other people work in Scarborough, Malton and Pickering as well as at the Goverment Radar and radio establishments at Fylingdales and Irton Moor (transport porovded). Most people work in offices and shops as there are very few factories in the area. Although thre is a regular bus service to Scarborough and Pickering (Hourly during all the day) most of the commuters travel by car. Although there are few farms in Snainton several people in the village work at jobs related to farming e.g contract work and machinery.
